NotificationsOriginal textContribute a better translation

When can we get food?

The monthly distribution locations listed are locations where food or other resources are distributed on a regular basis. The locations, dates, times, and contact information are provided for each location. It is unclear what specific resources are distributed at each location. It is recommended to contact the provided contact information for more information.
